meanings.definition: A machine that pushes or forces material through a shaped opening.
meanings.sent1: The extruder in the factory shapes the plastic into long tubes.
meanings.sent2: The 3D printer uses an extruder to create intricate designs layer by layer.
meanings.sent3: The extruder at the bakery decided to play a prank by making spaghetti out of cake batter.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like an extruder, molding his thoughts into a new perspective.
meanings.sent5: The extruder roared to life, transforming the raw material into a work of art.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that extrudes something.
meanings.sent1: The pasta extruder in the kitchen helps make different shapes of noodles.
meanings.sent2: The toothpaste extruder ensures that the right amount of paste comes out of the tube.
meanings.sent3: The extruder squirrel in the park always seemed to have an endless supply of acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like an extruder, pushing out joy and happiness to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The extruder of ideas, he constantly came up with innovative solutions to problems.
